p: On the other side, β-caryophyllene (30.33%), D-limonene (27.04%), trans-nerolidol (8.27%), and globulol (6.17%) were reported as significant compounds in the WI variety. β-caryophyllene (43.12%), globulol (18.47%), and trans-nerolidol (5.81%) were the major constituents of the E variety of P. guajava.
